resources:
rescue_clear TimeZone Spoofer Change time zone of selected apps
OK Done, please manually restart Duolingo Default Timezone Rescue Timezone RESCUE MY STREAKS! RESTORE Your device does not seem to support the timezone ID you entered. Example: America/Los_Angeles Current Duolingo timezone: Duolingo is in streak rescue mode now! Timezone: %s 1. When the "Default Timezone" is cleared, it will revert to the system time zone.\n2. When rescue mode is activated, only the Rescue Timezone will be used.\n3. Please do not rely on this module to achieve winning streaks. Language learning requires long-term regular persistence.
